TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NAquZ:ref

Hello,

There are no File Rename events in the EPP UI because no there were not any manual file name changes.
EPP server automatically creates a hash sum of the shadow copied file and stores it on the server in this way.
We suggested for customer to try to use SIEM [File Hash] field to correlate it with the shadow copy file name what is stored in the S3 Bucket.


Best regards,

[cid:8acab2d8-413e-497e-8dc7-b4e298e800ac]


Danylo Didenko

Security Support Engineer

CoreWin<https://corewin.ua/en/> | Contacts<https://corewin.ua/contacts/>
